original_title: Failure to prevent Easter Sunday attacks: Maithri’s appeal dismissed with cost
original_body_lines: Colombo Civil Appellate High Court today ordered to dismiss the appeal filed by former President Maithripala Sirisena who challenged the Colombo District Court's decision to reject his request that he be discharged from several civil lawsuits filed by the victims of Easter Sunday attacks.(Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
